alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Jefferson (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 1:13PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Jefferson and west central Arkansas Counties through 145 PM CDT... At 113 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Langford, or 17 miles south of Stuttgart, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lodge Corner... Bayou Meteo State Game Area... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
